description: Yuri`s Shikijika was sent out so Yuri scare the Yabukuron that the kids in her class had befriended. Satoshi decided to protect the Yabukuron though and sent Pikachu out to battle the Shikijika. It used Tackle against Pikachu but it missed and hit a pile of garbage, destabilizing the pile. It helped hold the pile up from falling on the everyone until Yabukuron saved everyone.
name: Shikijika (Yuri)
